title: [Epidemiology] As of 8th August, 12.6 million of the 4.46 billion doses administered globally were in low-income countries

[Neuroscience] Eating behavior and the brainâ€™s opioid system are connected, finds a new study. The less binding sites there were for the opioids, the greater was the tendency to eat in response to external stimuli, such as seeing appetizing food.
